content: Those are some great suggestions. I think the one that resonates with me the most is focusing on progress, not perfection. I tend to be really hard on myself when I don't meet my own expectations, so it's good to remember that it's okay to have off days. I've been struggling with anxiety and depression, and I know that some days are just going to be tougher than others. By focusing on progress, I can celebrate the small victories and not get discouraged by setbacks.
